==== Vingre ====

Vingre is a vnc connection manager.  It connects to desktops across a network.

'''Tests to try'''

** If you have 2 machines.  Enable desktop sharing on one.  Do this by going to '''System -> Preferences -> Remote Desktop''' and enable '''Allow other users to view my desktop'''.
** On the second machine go to '''Applications -> Internet -> Remote Desktop Viewer''', hit connect, type in the ip address of the 1st machine.
** Check that the mouse works and that the keyboard works and everything functions as though you were using the remote machine.
